snippet: Voting- and immigrant-rights advocates have called on the Justice Department to investigate accusations of disenfranchisement after a record number of votes remained uncounted.
abstract: Outcome of several election races remain mystery in Arizona as officials struggle to count a record number of early and provisional ballots, many cast by voters who believed they had registered but whose names were not on voter rolls; uncounted votes anger voting- and immigrant-rights advocates, who have called on Justice Department to investigate accusations of disenfranchisement.
lead_paragraph: Voting- and immigrant-rights advocates have called on the Justice Department to investigate accusations of disenfranchisement after a record number of votes remained uncounted.

headline.seo: Arizona Races Still Hang in the Balance Over Uncounted Votes
headline.main: Races in Arizona Still Hang in the Balance
headline.print_headline: Races in Arizona Still Hang in the Balance
